dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1971
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: "Travelogue" of a speaking trip to South Dakota where she admires rural family life, the folk university movement, and a sod hut. Comments on the women's liberation movement.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 510 1971-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
